quest.name: Prototypical Retrieval
journal:
Managingway needs someone to retrieve a machine on the run.

※Please note that the difficulty of this quest has been synced to your current level. Furthermore, you may not proceed with a class or job that is different from when you accepted this quest.
objectives: Search for the prototype supporter near Heimdall's Last Sight.
Deliver the prototype supporter to Managingway.

dialogue.name: MANAGINGWAY
dialogue.text: There's been an emergency call from Inventingway! One of his supporters under development has taken off without warning.

dialogue.name: MANAGINGWAY
dialogue.text: There's been an emergency call from Inventingway! Another one of his supporters has taken off without warning.

dialogue.name: MANAGINGWAY
dialogue.text: We tracked the machine as far as Heimdall's Last Sight, where deadly Allagan weapons are known to prowl.

dialogue.name: MANAGINGWAY
dialogue.text: As much as I dislike delegating dangerous tasks, we need you to find and retrieve the supporter. Please hurry...and be careful!

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: The supporter has ceased to function. Managingway will be eager to have it back.

dialogue.name: MANAGINGWAY
dialogue.text: Ah, you're back, and none the worse for the wear, thank goodness. You were able to retrieve our runaway supporter, I hope?

dialogue.name: MANAGINGWAY
dialogue.text: We're in your debt! Lest you wonder, this machine was designed to serve as our playmate.

dialogue.name: MANAGINGWAY
dialogue.text: In taking off as it did, it appears to have mistakenly identified the Allagan weapons as friends.

dialogue.name: MANAGINGWAY
dialogue.text: We're in your debt─again. It appears the machine still mistakenly identifies the Allagan weapons as friends...

dialogue.name: MANAGINGWAY
dialogue.text: We all need dreams, and it's a fine thing that Inventingway is dedicated to realizing his. I just wish he didn't create work for others in the process. It rather defeats the purpose of coming up with inventions to make our lives easier.
